title: For the Love of Linda
description:
Ever since the family dog passed away, LaNae Slater-Moss had an animal-sized hole in her heart. But when she noticed an injured squirrel in her backyard, she just might have found a way to fill it.

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
